description: Table containing Secure Chat message info.

columns.name: CONVERSATION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the secure chat conversation record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: INST_SENT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the message was sent.

columns.name: MESSAGE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This defines the type of message (for example, a normal message, a user joining the conversation, or a user leaving)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Chat Message


Participant Joined


Participant Left


Participant Auto Added


Participant Added From Group


Participant Turned Off Chat


Participant Removed From Group


Participant Added To Treatment Team


Participant Removed From Treatment Team


Group Detached


Title Changed


Image Message


Linked Content


System Message

columns.name: MESSAGE_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the priority for the message


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unspecified


Normal


Important


Urgent

columns.name: SENDER_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user that sent the message.

columns.name: SENDER_MYPT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the MyChart user who sent a Secure Chat message.

columns.name: PAT_MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the MyChart message linked to this Secure Chat message.
